basis: User expressed a concrete plan to prepare yogurt-berry cup, keep almonds handy, log after eating, perform a 60-second post-log pause, and rely on fixed options. No explicit report of actual consumption in this turn; action is plan-based.
cognitive_dissonance: No explicit internal conflict detected; user shows clear commitment and acceptance of contingencies.
negative_thought_patterns: Minimal; mentions potential stumbling but frames it with reset and continued adherence to routine.
emotional_triggers: Cravings and need for structure are ongoing triggers; user uses fixed options and short resets to manage them.
coaching_notes: Maintain a supportive, structured tone; acknowledge concrete planning and future execution. In next session, verify actual action taken, reinforce cues and contingencies, and encourage small, measurable adherence milestones.
